page.title: 15WHAT PEOPLE THINK OF ERSKINE
page.content: We asked people in the community what their thoughts were on Erskine.Here are some of the answers we recorded. The majority of people thought that Erskine was a good example of the planning of a new town.The reason most people gave for liking Erskine was the mixture of housing areas with lots of green areas.People felt the atmosphere of living in the countryside had not been spoiled.Also,most people liked the houses.However,there was one major complaint and that was the lack of amenities in the area,especially for younger people.A sports centre came top of the list of amenities that Erskine residents would like to see being built in the future.A cinema was also a popular choice.
